languages.text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text:
After triggering a psychic phenomena or perils of the warp:
- Wearer's Psy Rating is increased by 1 until the end of combat.
- Wearer gains momentum and temporary wounds equal to their Resolve.
Can be equipped only by Unsanctioned Psyker.

After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
- Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.
- Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

languages.text:
触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}之后：
- <indent=5%>装备者{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>装备者{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高，同时获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，两者都等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。</indent>
此装备只能由非法灵能者装备。
languages.original_text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text:
触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}之后：
- 装备者{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级，效果持续至战斗结束。
- 装备者{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}提高，同时获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，两者都等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
此手套只能由非法灵能者装备。

languages.text:
После того как персонаж вызвал {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозу варпа{/g}:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа увеличивается на 1 до конца боя.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} и временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} в количестве, равном своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.</indent>
Может использоваться только несанкционированным псайкером.
languages.original_text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text:
После того как персонаж вызвал {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозу варпа{/g}:
- {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа увеличивается на 1 до конца боя.
- Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментум{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} в количестве, равном своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Может использоваться только несанкционированным псайкером.

После того как персонаж вызвал {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозу варпа{/g}:
- {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа увеличивается на 1 до конца боя.
- Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментум{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} в количестве, равном своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Может использоваться только несанкционированным псайкером.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}が起こった後：
-<indent=5%>自身の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が戦闘終了まで+1。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を獲得。</indent>
非公認の異能者のみが装備可能。
languages.original_text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}が起こった後：
・自身の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が戦闘終了まで+1
・{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を獲得。
非公認の異能者のみが装備可能。

languages.text:
Después de activar un {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómeno psíquico{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}:
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador aumenta en +1 hasta el final del combate.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El portador gana {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales iguales a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.</indent>
Solo lo puede equipar un psíquico no autorizado.
languages.original_text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text:
Después de activar un {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómeno psíquico{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}:
- El {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador aumenta en +1 hasta el final del combate.
- El portador gana {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales iguales a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
Solo lo puede equipar un psíquico no autorizado.

languages.text:
Nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionischen Phänomens{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Trägers erhöht sich bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Der Träger erhält {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} und temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.</indent>
Kann nur von einem unsanktionierten Psioniker ausgerüstet werden.
languages.original_text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text:
Nach Auslösen eines {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionischen Phänomens{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}:
- Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Trägers erhöht sich um +1 bis zum Ende des Kampfes.
- Der Träger erhält {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} und temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
Kann nur von einem unbestätigten Psioniker ausgerüstet werden.

languages.text:
Après le déclenchement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomène psychique{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} :
-<indent=5%>L'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur augmente de +1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>L'utilisateur obtient de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} et un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.</indent>
Uniquement utilisable par un psyker non assermenté.
languages.original_text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

traits.locale_text:
Après le déclenchement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomène psychique{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} :
- L'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur augmente de +1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
- L'utilisateur acquiert de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} et un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
Uniquement utilisable par un psyker non assermenté.

languages.text:
Bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}ruhsezi fenomeni{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikesi{/g} tetiklediğinde:
-<indent=5%>Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} +1 artar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değeri kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} ve geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.</indent>
Yalnızca onaysız ruhsezerlerce kuşanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.
